metadata.description: Pattern features and directional configuration for wet bulb temperature prediction rules (weather_cleaned dataset)

categories.threshold_driven: Threshold driver rule（Based on a specific threshold condition）
categories.range_driven: Scope-driven rules（Based on specific range of values）

direction_mapping.1.0: Positive impact - It's causing the wet ball temperature to rise.
direction_mapping.-1.0: Negative impact - It causes the temperature of the wet ball to drop.
direction_mapping.0.0: Neutral effects - The effect on the temperature of the wet ball is unclear.

primary_variables.T: Dry ball temperature - Basic reference value for wet ball temperature
primary_variables.Tdew: Show some temperature - Direct indicator of absolute humidity
primary_variables.rh: Relative humidity - Key factors affecting the evaporation cooling effect
primary_variables.VPact: Actual water vapour - Actual vapour content in air
primary_variables.VPdef: Water pressure differential - evaporation driver indicator
primary_variables.wv: Wind speed - Impact heat transfer and evaporation efficiency
primary_variables.sh: Humidity - Another expression of absolute humidity
primary_variables.VPmax: Maximum water pressure - Saturation water vapour limit

secondary_variables.H2OC: Water vapour concentration - Another expression of humidity
secondary_variables.rho: Air density - Impact heat transfer efficiency
secondary_variables.max. wv: Maximum Wind Speed - Extreme wind condition indicator
secondary_variables.wd: Wind direction - Wet ball temperature is less affected
secondary_variables.PAR: Photolytic active radiation - Indicators of light intensity
secondary_variables.max. PAR: Maximum photolytic active radiation - Extreme indicators
secondary_variables.Tlog: Record temperature - Another record of temperature.
